questions.question: If 3x + 7 = 22, what is the value of 5x - 2?
questions.explanation: First solve for x: 3x = 15, so x = 5. Then calculate 5x - 2: 5(5) - 2 = 25 - 2 = 25
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: A shop offers a 15% discount on a £80 item. What is the final price?
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: What is the next number in the sequence: 3, 7, 15, 31, __?
questions.explanation: Each number is doubled and then 1 is added: 3×2+1=7, 7×2+1=15, 15×2+1=31, 31×2+1=63
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: The ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:4. If there are 28 students in total, how many boys are there?
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: What is the area of a triangle with base 8cm and height 12cm?
questions.explanation: Area of triangle = ½ × base × height = ½ × 8 × 12 = 48 cm²
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: If a cube has edges of length 5cm, what is its volume?
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: What is 2³ × 2⁴?
questions.explanation: When multiplying powers with same base, add exponents: 2³ × 2⁴ = 2³⁺⁴ = 2⁷
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: If 5 pencils cost £3, how much do 8 pencils cost?
questions.explanation: Cost per pencil = £3 ÷ 5 = £0.60. Cost of 8 pencils = 8 × £0.60 = £4.80
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: What is the sum of the angles in a pentagon?
questions.explanation: Sum of angles in a pentagon = (n-2) × 180° where n=5. So (5-2) × 180° = 540°
questions.subject: Mathematics
